1.content:
Alright, now first we need to find which type of animal you want to see stuffed silly, so i'm gonna make four basic categories, as well as an 'Advanced' section for more.

so, here are the categories.

1. Canine. your four legged, furry friends, loyal, dependable, and oh so squishy when fat.

2. Feline. for the cat lovers out there, who want sly, sophisticated fatties.

3. Rodent. for those who prefer smaller fatties.

4. Avian. for feathery fatties.

5. Advanced. Including Bovine, Equine, Hybrids, and Primates.

take your pick.
1.title: Beginnings.

11.content: Alright, so a canine, these are quite many indeed, what specific type of canine would you like? a Vulpine? a Lupine? or maybe just a common house dog of some kind? pick below.
11.title: Canine.

111.content: Ah, so thou wisheth to see a beautiful, majestic and elegant wolf grow do you? very well, but even now we face choices, what sort would you like? a common grey wolf? or maybe a Red wolf? or even a Dingo, Wild dog or Coyote? the choice is yours.
111.title: Lupine (wolf types)

choices: A Male Wolf Of Your Own
A Female Wolf Of Your Own
1111.content: So you want a grey wolf to gain? What type of wolf would you want it to be? A character from a movie, like Balto, or create your own male or female wolf?
1111.title: Grey wolf

11111.content: What if we had Balto and Jenna gaining at the same time?
11111.title: A Wolf From Balto

choices: They Both Get Fattened By Food
Jenna Gets Pregnant, And Balto Overeats
111111.content:
It was a winter day after Balto had just arrived back from his long adventure, saving many lives in the process. People referred to him as a hero for all that he did, especially after he rescued Jenna's owner, a little girl who was very sick. At this point, Jenna was happy because her owners were now taking Balto in as their own, which meant one thing: he was going to get pampered.

Balto kept on thinking he same thing as he wondered what would happen next. Balto knew that he was going to get all the food that he would want in the town. At the same time, he was also thinking about a future with Jenna, the dog that he was in love with. He knew he would pick up some pounds from being pampered, but he also wanted to have something for her as well.

What route do they take?
111111.title: Balto And Jenna

113.content: OK Domestic it is, now what breed of house dog will you choose from?
113.title: Domestic (house dog breeds)

15.content:
yah so heres the other choices.

Bovids; because cows.

Equines; for those who want a much bigger pony show.

Dragons: because scaly fats.

Primates: cuz even monkeys can relax.

Hybrids; for some nice cute combo's.
15.title: Advanced.

151.content:
So, this set of stories are gonna be about cows growing to huge sizes. so here are some preliminary girls for ya.

Daisy: a year old Cow girl who is average weight for her species, with a pure white coat, and a small, flower shaped black mark on her cheek. She is currently coming into season properly for the first time and is looking for a male.

Lily: a young, 3 month old calf. Black with a white face, she is a greedy calf for her age, and fond of her mothers milk.

Wynne: a two year old cow, brown and white, currently with child and getting hungrier.
151.title: Bovid's

info.brief_description: expand animals in many ways, such as weight gain, inflation, feral tit expansion etc.
info.description:
This is a story for expanding those creatures we usually see as pets, seeing the ways gravidity effects the cute, cuddly and varied animals in the world.

rules are the same as in my other interactives, no Scat, no toilet humour, no watersports, no feet expansion, no popping, death, or vore. Unbirth is ok, but no 'absorbtion'. other expansions and fetishes will need to be run by me via Personal Message before they're implimented, other than that, have fun.
